history.content:
If you are an L&S student with an Expected Graduation Term (EGT) later than Fall 2021, and you would like to change it to Fall 2021, the deadline to submit your application to change your EGT to Fall is October 15. If you are in the College of Engineering, you should speak to your ESS advisor about this procedure.

You should be sure to get a degree check with a major advisor before you submit this if your Academic Progress Report is showing that you are missing any CS coursework.

Here is the application for L&S. Fill it out and send it to lspetitions@berkeley.edu.
history.subject: Deadline to Change your Expected Graduation Term (L&S) is 10/15/21
